title: Brochure, "Brochure for Visitors Center, Downtown Walking Tour, Columbus, Indiana", 1973
medium: Offset lithograph on medium heavy off-white paper
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink on brochure cover, lower left:  Downtown/Walking Tour/Columbus/Indiana; to right of central text blocks in black (each one indicated by heading), upper right:  Downtown Walking Tour; center right:  Driving Tour; lower center right:  Bus Tour; lower right corner:  Visitors Center; on rear cover in red, along left edge :  numbers 1 to 11; down center:  12 to 18;  center left, in black:  building indentification (1-11) with location, architect, and date; along right edge:  building identification (1-18) with location, architect, and date; inside, ; in lower right corner, in cream:  N  [with white arrow above]/ imprinted in black:  Downtown/Walking Tour/Columbus/Indiana; street names identified in black throughout.
description: A folded four-page hand out that opens backwards.  Rand's  "C" (shaped like a circle) logo in red and green runs "randomly" down the left side of the brochure cover. On right side, a series of text blocks in black with statement of instructions for walking, driving, bus tour; location, hours, and phone number of the Visitors Center.  On back, a list of eighteen numbered architectural sites, with black and white thumbnail photographs, architects names, and dates for each building.  Inside, a two-page street map in beige and white with diagrams(in plan) in white and black of relevant buildings, identified by number.  The suggested tour is indicated in red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Brochure, "Brochure for Visitors Center, Downtown Walking Tour, Columbus, Indiana", 1973.
1973. Offset lithograph on medium heavy off-white paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-58.
